name: Quality Hotel Noah's On the Beach

reviews.text: We stayed at Noah's for 2 nights, in Friday out Sunday, it was nice and relaxing, had a harbour view room. Staff were pleasant at all times. We had a small balcony and had some really cool views of ships coming into the harbour, and the old buildings.
reviews.title: Wow what a view......

reviews.text: We had breakfast included and the view during breakfast was absolutely worth it, the meal was huge so we didnt have lunch. A lovely hotel, overall, the only drawback was the scary carpark. Its really small and not very secure looking but the ice cream shop open till late at night was a plus for my husband!!!!!!
reviews.title: Fabulous ocean views
Very friendly hotel
reviews.text: This is a great hotel overlooking the ocean. Although not beachfront, there is a road to cross over it has incredible ocean views. The hotel room is the normal you would expect from this sort of establishment. I remember it being on the large size with all modern facilities. The hotel is in a good trendy area of Newcastle and is in easy walk to everything. It is a must if stopping over or visiting Newcastle.
PROS: Beautiful sweeping views of coastline and beaches. Close to everything..ie beaches, shops and restaurants. Car parking available with no extra cost.
reviews.title: Comfortable clean hotel with nice beach view

reviews.text: I loved this hotel. I was only here for two nights, but I wish it were longer. The hotel is small and comfortable. I had a beach side room and it was well worth it! When I stepped out on the balcony from my room, the New Castle beach was right there-I could almost touch it. The waves late at night and early in the morning were so peaceful. It was winter when I went so the weather wasn't too great. The heating in the room was terrible. It was either unbearably hot or freezing. The comforter on the bed was terrible. It looked old and used- maybe it was the brown orange color that turned me off but I hated it. The bathroom was small and a bit uncomfortable, but the showerhead was great! But the room always smelled clean and new. There were several channels on TV but the wireless internet was not free but was reasonably priced. After I paid it was easily accessible. The restraunt was gorgeous with a glass wall showcasing the ocean view. I would very much recommend this place.
reviews.title: Beautiful view
Great location and restaurant
reviews.text: This property is worth staying at for the location and the restaurant alone. The rooms are pretty average and need a makeover including new beds. But being so close to this iconic beach is the bonus - be sure to take an Oceanview room.
Staff were very good in all areas and free newspapers available each day.
reviews.title: Bathroom needs a reno pronto!!

reviews.text: The restaurant is great especially for lunch where you can sit and watch the surf and all the action but in air conditioned comfort. The food was very good.
reviews.title: saw Dolphins in Harbour from room window
look out the window not in the room
reviews.text: The view was fantastic!! The hotel charges a $200 per night average, however the bathroom was right out of the early 80's water damaged cabinate missing and mouldy grout very disappointing.
